It was goopy all over the lid and container I had washed it off as it was sealed.  But then I noticed under light it was purple ? It was not the same color as the pitcher it smells amazing. However  the other disappointed thing was the product was strange in texture. It was like part of it was hard as a rock while the other part was runny ? I couldn't figure out  why and my Husband brought me this 12$ for this ? I think this is a rip off and suggest to please be careful when purchasing I highly will not be  buying this again

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has demonstrated a strong preference for products that offer excellent performance and aesthetic appeal. Items such as bronzers, brushes, and body creams consistently received high ratings and were described positively. Users particularly enjoyed features like pleasant scents and travel-friendly packaging. The effectiveness of products in providing a quality experience was emphasized, with remarks on their softness, ease of use, and overall satisfaction. Recommendations from friends also led to repeat purchases that resulted in delight, showcasing a sense of reliability in those purchases.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Several purchases revealed dissatisfaction with product quality and effectiveness. Specific complaints highlighted issues like shedding bristles, rough textures, and poor design in brush sets. Other products were criticized for not meeting visual expectations, with discrepancies noted between advertised appearances and actual results. Packaging issues, including the condition of items upon arrival, led to disappointment and feelings of being misled. Certain items were viewed as overpriced for the quality received, driving a reluctance to repurchase similar items.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping behavior reflects a blend of positive and negative experiences. While many products garnered high ratings for their quality, aesthetics, and functional benefits, there were notable frustrations regarding certain brush sets and product inconsistencies. Recommendations from friends positively influenced purchases, leading to satisfaction with select items. However, dissatisfaction with product quality, misleading appearance, and high prices for underwhelming items surfaced as significant concerns. This nuanced experience underscores the importance of reliable product quality and realistic marketing.
